mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carts (user_id, buch_id, num) VALUES (#{uid}, #{vo.id}, #{vo.count})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, b.id b_id, b.name b_name, b.price b_price, b.discount b_discount, p.name p_name, p.id p_id FROM carts c INNER JOIN buchs b ON b.id = c.buch_id INNER JOIN publishers p ON p.id = b.publisher_id WHERE c.user_id = #{uid};
